details.title: Stability analysis using the minimum function analysis approach
details.abstract: This article studies a new kind of stability judgment for dynamic systems, the definiteness Lyapunov derivative function approach based on the minimum function. The new results are described by introducing the normal positivity. The article analyzes the relationship of a general system and a polynomial system, the judgment and measurement of positive definiteness, the polar coordinate approach, and constructing the algorithms for positive definite v(x). Therefore, a new and systematic theory on stability judgment is clearly described.
